overview: "Himmlers Kantele Player" -  about Finnish student, who decides to leave University of Sorbonne and walk from Paris to Helsinki in the spring of 1935. On his way, in Germany, he meets Heinrich Himmler, who is attracted by a traditional Finnish instrument, kantele. Himmler employs Yrj√∂ as researcher to the Ahnenerbe institute to find the Aryan roots from the runic singing culture of Finnish Carelia.
title: Himmlerin kanteleensoittaja
